name: Die To ReBurn
description:
Controls
  • Hold Left Mouse Button - to fly up
  • Click Right Mouse Button - to shoot a fireball

Important! If the game looks laggy to you, please make sure that your browser has WebGL enabled: https://blog.colonist.io/how-to-enable-webgl/

Story

The legendary bird Phoenix lost most of its power after a vicious attack. Collect the Phoenix's embers that spread around the world and return Phoenix to its lost glory. Become stronger and brighter every time you die. This is rebirth of a legend.

Additional Info

This game was made as part of GameDev.tv Game jam 2022 in 10 days. the theme of the game was "Death is only the beginning". I made it by myself and used various free art and audio assets to help me build the game.
